body.p:
LOUISVILLE HOTEL
REBUILT 1856. ENLARGED & REFURNISHED 1859.
KEAN STEELE & JUDGE
Proprietors.
Cor Sixth & Main Str.
LOUISVILLE KY.

Louisville Ky. 4th April 1865
Gov. Bramlette
Dear Sir,
The, petition, and Sworn Statements (to-gether with other papers, relating to the Same case) of Messrs Short and Harding, will be handed you by our friend Dr W. L. Turner,
After a theugheugh investigation of the case, I am convinced, that, the Executive clemency asked for Should be granted,

The, character of Redman, the accuser, the facts in the case, and the previous good character, if the accused bear me out in what I say, and I earnestly hope your excellency will after due investigations and reflection interpose Your authority, and extend the releif asked for --

Very respectfully
Your obedient Servant &
friend
J. H. Chandler
